content: are you ready to bring a touch of winter magic into your home today i m excited to share my crochet snowflake coaster pattern perfect for beginners and experienced crocheters alike **materials** ▢lily sugar n cream - blue jean cotton ▢lily sugar n cream - white cotton ▢4 5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase
